extension_name.description: The name of the extension. Better if not changed.

extension_description.message: The browser extension every iTIC student should have!

ocw_replacer_view.description: Button that lets users view a file in the browser instead of downloading it.

ocw_replacer_download_all.description: Button that lets users download all the files from a subject or folder.

ocw_downloader_done.description: Used as an OK to window prompts.

ocw_downloader_close.description: Used as a message to exit PopUps.

ocw_downloader_cancel.description: Message used to cancel a folder, subject or quadrimester download.

ocw_downloader_downloading_msg.description: This will appear on-screen during the subject download as the TITLE.

ocw_downloader_fetching_msg.description: This will appear on-screen during the download as the subtitle.

ocw_downloader_compressing_msg.description: This will appear on-screen during the download as the subtitle.

ocw_downloader_success_msg.description: Message shown when a subject/folder/quadrimester download is completed.

ocw_downloader_error_msg.description: Message shown when an error occurs when downloading a file.

ocw_downloader_empty_subject_msg.message: There is nothing to download here!
ocw_downloader_empty_subject_msg.description: Message shown when the subject/quadrimester/folder that we want to download is empty.

schedule_loader_redirecting.description: Title of the schedule load page.

schedule_loader_information.message: Your schedule is being loaded. This will take less than 2 seconds ...
schedule_loader_information.description: Information of the schedule load page.

schedule_picker_save_btn.description: Button clicked once a schedule is selected.

schedule_picker_setup_title.description: Title of the alert describing what to do.

schedule_picker_setup_info.message:
Let iTIC Copilot save your subjects in order to display the schedule.
You will always be able to modify your subjects in the settings menu.
schedule_picker_setup_info.description:
Text of the alert describing what to do. DO NOT remove the
, nor put spaces in between.

schedule_picker_confirm_title.description: Title for schedule save confirm dialog.

schedule_picker_confirm_text.message: Do you want iTIC Copilot to save this schedule?
schedule_picker_confirm_text.description: Text for schedule save confirm dialog.

schedule_picker_done_text.message: Your schedule has been saved. Click on the button below to see it.
schedule_picker_done_text.description: Once a schedule is saved, info message.

schedule_picker_see_schedule.description: Once a schedule is saved, button to see it.

autologger_remember_credentials.message: Let iTIC Copilot remember your credentials
autologger_remember_credentials.description: Option that will appear on the login page.

autologger_enable_autologin.message: Auto-login when a login page appears
autologger_enable_autologin.description: Option that will appear on the login page.

itic_copilot_credentials_title.description: Title of the credentials request pop-up.

itic_copilot_credentials_username.description: Username text of the credentials request pop-up.

itic_copilot_credentials_password.description: Password text of the credentials request pop-up.

escriny_edit_text.description: Title of the edit file section.

escriny_fetching_error.message: An error occurred while fetching the url.

escriny_commit_title.description: Commit title (usually doesn't have a translation).

escriny_commit_completed_text.message:
The commit has been uploaded successfully.
Be aware that the content may take several minutes to be updated on the web.
escriny_commit_completed_text.description:
Text of the success pop-up. DO NOT touch the '
' nor put spaces in between.

escriny_commit_message_placeholder.description: Placeholder of the input area in the commit message.

escriny_load_file_placeholder.description: Placeholder for when the file is bein loaded.

escriny_load_file_error.message: Could not load file contents. Reload the page to retry.
escriny_load_file_error.description: Error message for when the file could not be loaded.

ui_landpage_links_title.description: Title of the links section in the user interface.

ui_landpage_links_description.message: Go to these sites to see the extension's potential!
ui_landpage_links_description.description: Text (or description) of the links section in the user interface.

ui_landpage_links_atenea.description: Atenea link name (no need to translate).

ui_landpage_links_ocw.description: OCW link name (no need to translate).

ui_landpage_links_escriny.description: Escriny link name (no need to translate).

ui_landpage_links_overleaf.description: Overleaf link name (no need to translate).

ui_landpage_links_calendar.description: Link name of the course calendar.

ui_landpage_links_schedule.description: Link name of the current schedule.

ui_landpage_links_course_guides.description: Link name of the course guides.

ui_landpage_links_e_secretaria.description: E-secretaria link name (no need to translate).

ui_about_title.description: About section title and button name.

ui_settings_reload_hint.message: Reload current pages to apply changes.
ui_settings_reload_hint.description: Disclaimer on top of the settings menu.

ui_settings_general_title.description: Title of the general section on the settings menu.

ui_settings_save_upc_credentials.description: Option to save upc credentials in the settings menu.

ui_settings_username_placeholder.description: Format of the upc username. 'name' and 'surname' can be trnanslated.

ui_settings_password_disclaimer.message: Passwords will be NEVER stored in plain text, nor shared or synced.
ui_settings_password_disclaimer.description: Disclaimer for passwords policy. Please keep the and keys.

ui_settings_sync_settings.description: Option to permit settings sync among devices.

ui_settings_new.description: Disclaimer for when a setting is new.

ui_settings_autologin.description: Option to allow auto-login on some pages.

ui_settings_autologin_hint.message: must be enabled to perform auto-login.
ui_settings_autologin_hint.description: Some settings must be enabled... the beginning of the sentence is missing on purpose.

ui_settings_comming_soon.description: Placeholder for when there aren't any options.

ui_settings_escriny_edit_files.description: Option to permit the edition of files on the escriny website.

ui_settings_reset_schedule.description: Button used to choose another set of subjects.

ui_settings_reset_schedule_hint.message: Click this button to choose another set of subjects
ui_settings_reset_schedule_hint.description: Text of the button used to choose another set of subjects.

ui_settings_advanced_title.description: Title of the advanced settings section.

ui_settings_easter_eggs.description: Option to enable or disable easter eggs.

ui_settings_gmail_url.description: Text prompting the gmail url in the settings menu.

ui_settings_restore.description: Button used to restore all the settings to its default values.

ui_settings_restore_done.description: Done message showing when settings are reset.

ui_about_liscence_title.description: Title of the liscence section in the about page.

ui_about_liscence_text.message: This extension is part of an open source project, liscenced with the GNU General Public Liscence V3 (GPL3). See more details of it
ui_about_liscence_text.description: This text is continued in the 'ui_about_liscence_link' key.

ui_about_liscence_link.description: Continuation of the 'ui_about_liscence_link' text. Here is where the user will be able to click.

ui_about_privacy_title.description: Title of the privacy section in the about page.

ui_about_privacy_text.message: As you can verify with your own eyes (because it's an Open Source project), we don't do anything with your data. Passwords or other preferences may be saved by request, but only locally (we don't receive anything from you).
ui_about_privacy_text.description: Text of the privacy section in the about page.

ui_about_contribute_title.description: Contribution title on the about page.

ui_about_contribute_text.message: You can report bugs, suggestions, or contribute to the iTIC Copilot extension by going in the
ui_about_contribute_text.description: This text is continued in the 'ui_about_contribute_link' key.

ui_about_contribute_link.description: This text is the continuation of 'ui_about_contribute_text'. here will be the link to click.

log_ocw_error_download.message: An error occurred. Check the console.
